programlisting:
<Input ssl> Module im_ssl Host localhost Port 23456 CAFile %CERTDIR%/ca.pem CertFile %CERTDIR%/client-cert.pem CertKeyFile %CERTDIR%/client-key.pem KeyPass secret InputType Binary </Input>
<Output fileout> Module om_file File "tmp/output" </Output>
<Route 1> Path ssl => fileout </Route>
